snippet.title: BBC News - London 2012: Sunday trading law suspension bid for Olympics
snippet.description: * BBC News - London 2012: Sunday trading law suspension bid for Olympics (clueweb12-1000tw-48-07777) http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-17419351?utm_source=BBC&utm_medium=twitter ...restricted to any six hours of continuous trading between 10:00 and 18:00 on Sundays. And they cannot open at all on Easter Sunday. 'Profoundly worrying' The law also includes specific measures to protect the rights of shop workers who do not wish to work on Sunday. By temporarily suspending these rules, the government hopes hundreds of thousands of visitors who head to London for the sporting spectacle will take advantage of late-night shopping in the West End... [cached version]
